# Issue Template for GPTCorn

## Describe the Issue

A clear and concise description of what the issue is.

## To Reproduce

Steps to reproduce the behavior:

1. Go to '...'
2. Click on '....'
3. Scroll down to '....'
4. See error

## Expected Behavior

A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen.

## Screenshots

If applicable, add screenshots to help explain your problem.

## Additional Context

Add any other context about the problem here, like the environment in which the issue was observed (OS, browser version,
etc.).
